Activate.DESCRIPTION: Execute the current intent. #yDolls are #yActivated at the end of turn, or manually through other effects.

Amplification.DESCRIPTION: Increase incoming #yAttack damage by #b1% per stack of [Amplification], rounded up.

Attachment.DESCRIPTION: Apply a persistent effect to a #yDoll. If it dies, move all #yAttached cards from your #yExhaust pile to your discard pile.

Summon.DESCRIPTION: You can #ySummon up to #b4 #yDolls (If full, raise the max [HP] of all #yDolls instead). Once per turn, you can #pRight-Click on them to change their intent.

Summoning Sickness.DESCRIPTION: You can't #ySummon new #yDolls. Whenever you play a card, decrease [SK] by #b1.

Unnamed Doll.DESCRIPTION: #yAttack: Damages a random enemy, prioritizing enemies with #yDebuffs. NL #yDefend: Grants [Block], receives all incoming unblocked #yAttack damage. NL #yOn #yDeath: Allies gain #b1 [Strength].

Withering.DESCRIPTION: Reduce #yAttack damage by #b1% per stack of [Withering] (Max #b60%^). Reduce stacks of [Withering] by #b25% each turn.
